info.name: Fabits MyWealth API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for Fabits MyWealth Platform - Includes Auth, Mutual Funds, Baskets, SIPs, Payments, Portfolio, Plans, and more

request.description: Validates user OTP and returns authentication token
Check if KYC has been initiated for the user
Fetch KYC statuses for a customer by phone number

item.name: Mutual Funds
item.description: Mutual fund data, search, and information endpoints

request.description: Search for mutual funds by name or keyword
Get historical chart data for a specific mutual fund
Get main information for a specific mutual fund
Get general information for a specific mutual fund
Get BSE SIP dates and information for a mutual fund
Get user's recently viewed mutual funds
Add a fund to recently viewed list

item.name: Mutual Fund Orders
item.description: Place orders, holdings, and order history for mutual funds

request.description: Get user's mutual fund order history
Place a mutual fund order (lumpsum or SIP)
Verify OTP for mutual fund transactions

item.name: Mutual Fund Baskets
item.description: Basket-based mutual fund investments and management

request.description: Get all available mutual fund baskets
Place a one-time order for a basket

item.name: Place Multi Basket One Time Order

request.description: Place one-time orders for multiple baskets
Get details of a specific investment box
Create a prototype first plan for new users
